name: Preschool
description: The preschool program serves children from 2-5 years of age. The program is divided into age groups: 2's, 3's and Pre-K (4's and 5's). Program hours are from 9 a.m. - 3:30 p.m. Monday - Friday. They also offer part time schedules with three or four days per week and morning hours from 9 a.m. - 12:30 p.m. (1:30 p.m. for Pre K). In addition they offer an early care option from 8:30 a.m. - 9 a.m.

howToGetIt: Visit the admissions page on their website to schedule a tour and complete an enrollment form.
cost: This is a fee based service
agency: Growing Place Family Preschool And Parenting Center
